name: Deity (Solaris)
description:
Deity

Controls
Move - W A S D / Middle Mouse
Lightning - Left Click
Center Camera - F2

Game Paradigm

The idea of this game is you play as a Deity which may damage the world using the weather - Specifically lightning because I didn't get around to adding other weather effects.

What I couldn't add

I wanted to have the ability to unlock more weather effects which you could find throughout the world. These would be selectable via a hotbar (the hotbar still somewhat exists in code).

I would've liked a larger world with more terrain but the person creating some art for me had to leave, so all of the bad art you see is what I had to do (e.g., the lightning effect).

I wanted this game playable in the browser but I left it too soon and I had Emscripten issues therefore I just had to upload a regular executable.

https://github.com/Charlie-Gallie/Deity
